[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.27.0" background_enable_color="on" background_color="#253B50" background_enable_image="off" custom_padding="100px||100px||true|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="4.27.0" max_width="800px" custom_padding="0px||0px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.27.0" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" header_2_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_2_text_color="#ffffff" header_2_font_size="40px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" text_orientation="center" custom_margin="||16px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

Let’s Start a Conversation

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.8)" text_font_size="18px" text_line_height="1.7em" text_orientation="center" max_width="600px" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="||40px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

We’re eager to understand your challenges and explore how we can help. No pressure, no sales pitch—just a genuine conversation about your manufacturing operations.

[/et_pb_text] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.27.0" max_width="500px" custom_padding="0px||0px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.27.0" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_button button_url="/contact/" button_text="Talk to Our Team" button_alignment="right" _builder_version="4.27.0" custom_button="on" button_text_size="16px" button_text_color="#253B50" button_bg_color="#ffffff" button_border_width="0px" button_border_radius="8px" button_font="Lexend|600|||||||" custom_padding="16px|32px|16px|32px|true|true" button_bg_color__hover_enabled="on|hover" button_bg_color__hover="#e2e8f0" global_colors_info="{}"] [/et_pb_button] [/et_pb_column] [et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.27.0" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_button button_url="/partner-program/" button_text="Explore Partnership" button_alignment="left" _builder_version="4.27.0" custom_button="on" button_text_size="16px" button_text_color="#ffffff" button_bg_color="rgba(0,0,0,0)" button_border_width="2px" button_border_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.5)" button_border_radius="8px" button_font="Lexend|600|||||||" custom_padding="14px|32px|14px|32px|true|true" button_text_color__hover_enabled="on|hover" button_text_color__hover="#ffffff" button_border_color__hover_enabled="on|hover" button_border_color__hover="#ffffff" global_colors_info="{}"] [/et_pb_button] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]

info.name: DigiWin Homepage - Section 9: CTA Footer
info.description: Final call-to-action section. Dark navy background with centered headline, subtitle, and two buttons: primary white 'Talk to Our Team' and ghost outline 'Explore Partnership'.
divi_modules_used: et_pb_button (primary white CTA, ghost outline CTA)
notes: Contact URL set to /contact/ - update to actual form page URL after import
Welcoming tone: 'Let's Start a Conversation' not 'Book a Demo'
Two buttons side by side: solid white + ghost outline
Button row uses narrow max_width (500px) to keep buttons close together
